content: Good watchface overall but lacks a decent AOD watchface. For the price I paid for meh could be worst.
overall pretty good but I would prefer to change to non us date system

Any chance complications can be made available on the ambient screen? Side note, not to be overly critical, but you either need to display a blank AOD in the screenshots or offer to customize it on a paid app. Otherwise you users are in for an unpleasant surprise after they pay you for the app. Thanks.
Beautiful watchface. However, sometimes widgets disappear. I have to switch to default watchface and then switch back to this one and they reappear.
Clean, sharp and informative. Love it!

Very nice & elegant face. Would be please possible add option to select image background? I want to use "album art" as background when music is playing + black color as fallback when its not. Also if would be possible to place a bigger complication on the bottom position it would be great!

I really like this watchface. The choice of fonts, the layout of the watchface, the seconds hand moving around the face, are all done with good taste in my opinion. We can customize colours and complications and that is it. I wish we had more options for ambient mode (what to show and how dim). Update: After a few days of using this watchface, my Fossil Gen 3 battery only lasted one day... by late afternoon I would be on battery saver. With A/D watchface I recharge my watch every 2 days. So, I really like the look of this watchface (material style), but stopped using it because of high battery usage.

Simple and beautiful watchface, highly recommended!  Somehow after resetting my watch I could not reinstall this warchface anymore.  The play store on my mobile told me that I do not have any compatible devices. The play store in the browser told me, that the app is already installed. Trying to reinstall it on my Fossil Full Guard resulted in an unknown error.  I contacted the developer on a Sunday evening and I got a reply within an hour telling me that I should try to reinstall the app via the play store on the watch... Well played Blueiceshard, that worked, thanks!!!  Kudos to the developer, nothing to Google...

In a sea of totally crappy watch faces this stands out as an actually great one. Skip the rest use this. I can't say recommend this enough.  Suggestions for improvement:  1. Open the agenda when the user taps on the date (currently a tap there goes nowhere)  2. Add an option to center the time. Currently off-center because of the seconds.  3. Add an option to display the battery level in the ring where the seconds are currently displayed.  But as it stands without these (minor) suggestions, it's still the best watchface hands down.

Hey, I really like the app, however, every time the screen goes to sleep (with Always-on feature), the time appears in different position, sometimes practically touching the Don't Disturb icon, sometimes a bit higher (which is desirable), and everything in between. Even the Don't Disturb icon changes - sometimes it's full, sometimes it's outline. Can this be fixed? I can provide screenshots.  Edit: It's Huawei Watch
replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback.

The time position in always-on mode slightly changes to prevent screen burn-in on AMOLED displays. 

UPDATE: With the new update, the position is a bit adjusted. The time indicator should not touch the Do not disturb icon now.

content: This is easily the best watch face available. It's simple, classy, and also suitably "Android" feeling. Not to mention the great complication options. This is an easy $1 to spend! I cannot recommend enough!
Simple and clean, and the Material design looks great in just about any color.
Love it, wish I could pick any color, not just the material colors
replyContent:
Great news! With the new update you can use any color by typing in it's RGB code.

Thanks for your feedback.
